flavor: "Nur die freundliche Spinne aus der Nachbarschaft!"
name: Spider-Man
text: Spinnensinn — Unterbrechung: Sobald der Schurke einen Angriff gegen dich einleitet, ziehe 1 Karte.

flavor: "Im Moment würde ich die ganze Spider-Man-Nummer gegen einen Schaukelstuhl und eine gutes Buch eintauschen."
name: Peter Parker
text: Wissenschaftler — Ressource: Erzeuge eine [mental]-Ressource. (Nur einmal pro Runde.)

flavor: "Ich bin keine Heldin, ich bin eine Diebin."
name: Black Cat
text: Erzwungene Reaktion: Nachdem du Black Cat gespielt hast, lege die 2 obersten Karten deines Decks ab. Nimm jede auf diese Weise abgelegte Karte mit einer aufgedruckten [mental]-Ressource auf deine Hand.

flavor: "Hast du trainiert? Das hat mich fast getroffen." -- Spider-Man
name: Rückwärtssalto
text: Unterbrechung (Verteidigung): Sobald du eine beliebige Menge an Schaden durch einen Angriff nehmen würdest, verhindere allen Schaden davon.

flavor: "Mein Spinnensinn klingelt!" -- Spider-Man
name: Verstärkter Spinnensinn
text: Held — Unterbrechung: Sobald einen Verratskarte vom Begegnungsdeck aufgedeckt wird, hebe deren "Sobald aufgedeckt"-Effekte auf.

flavor: "Halali!" -- Spider-Man
name: Schwingender Netz-Kick
text: Held — Aktion (Angriff): Füge einem Gegner 8 Schaden zu.

flavor: "Meine Güte, Peter! Du bist in letzter Zeit so ungeschickt."
name: Tante May
text: Alter-Ego — Aktion: Erschöpfe Tante May → heile 4 Schaden von Peter Parker.

name: Spider-Tracer
text: Hänge diese Karte an einen Schergen an. Erzwungene Unterbrechung: Sobald der Scherge mit diesem Upgrade besiegt wird, entferne 3 Bedrohung von einem Plan.

name: Netzsprpüher
text: Anwendungen (3 Netzmarker). (Kommt mit 3 Markern ins Spiel. Sobald alle Marker entfernt sind, lege diese Karte ab.) Held — Ressource: Erschöpfe Netzsprüher und entferne 1 Netzmarker von ihm → erzeuge eine [wild]-Ressource.

name: Eingesponnen
text: Nur Heldengestalt. Hänge diese Karte an einen Gegner an. Max. 1 pro Gegner. Erzwungene Unterbrechung: Sobald der Gegner mit diesem Upgrade angreifen würde, lege stattdessen Eingesponnen ab. Betäube dann den Gegner.

flavor: "Ich gebe niemals auf."
name: Captain Marvel
text: Umleiten — Aktion: Gib eine [energy]-Ressource aus und heile 1 Schaden von Captain Marvel → ziehe eine Karte. (Nur einmal pro Runde.)

flavor: "Es ist meine Aufgabe, die Erde und jeden darauf zu beschützen."
name: Carol Danvers
text: Commander — Aktion: Der Spieler zieht eine Karte. (Nur einmal pro Runde.)

flavor: "Das ist es was ich schon immer machen wollte: den Unschuldigen helfen, indem ich die Schuldigen krankenhausreif schlage."
name: Spider-Woman
text: Reaktion: Nachdem Spider-Woman ins Spiel gekommen ist, verwirre den Schurken.

flavor: "Ich hab ja schon viel Mist gesehen, aber das hier ist beeindruckender als das meiste." -- Carol Danvers
name: Krisenintervention
text: Held — Aktion (Widerstand): Entferne 2 Bedrohung von einem Plan. Entferne dann 2 Bedrohung von einem anderen Plan, falls du das Merkmal [[Fliegend]] hast.

name: Photonenstrahl
text: Held — Aktion (Angriff): Füge einem Gegner 5 Schaden zu. Ziehe eine Karte, falls du für diese Karte mit einer [energy]-Ressource bezahlt hast.

flavor: "Das reicht!" -- Carol Danvers
name: Energieabsorption

flavor: Diese Raumstation in niedriger Umlaufbahn kann Fracht und Besatzung zum und vom Triskelion beamen.
name: Alpha Flight Station
text: Aktion: Erschöpfe Alpha Flight Station, wähle 1 Karte von deiner Hand und lege sie ab → ziehe 1 Karte (ziehe stattdessen 2 Karten, falls du Carol Danvers bist).

flavor: "Das ist so cool!" -- Jessica Drew
name: Captain Marvels Helm
text: Captain Marvel bekommt +1 VER (+2 VER stattdessen, falls du das Merkmal [[Fliegend]] hast).

name: Kosmischer Flug
text: Captain Marvel erhält das Merkmal [[Fliegend]]. Held — Unterbrechung (Verteidigung): Sobald Captain Marvel Schaden nehmen würde, lege kosmischer Flug ab → verhindere 3 Schaden davon.

name: Energie kanalisieren
text: Max. 1 pro Spieler. Aktion: Gib X [energy]-Ressourcen aus → lege X Energiemarker hierhin. Held — Aktion (Angriff): Lege Energie kanalisiern ab → füge einem Gegner für jeden hier liegenden Energiemarker 2 Schaden zu (bis zu einem Maximum von 10).

flavor: "I'm six foot seven and bright green! People are gonna stare no matter how I dress."
name: She-Hulk
text: "Do You Even Lift?" — Reaktion: After you change to this form, deal 2 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "I can turn into a Hulk anytime I want. But just because you can do something doesn't always mean you should.
name: Jennifer Walters
text: "I Object!" — Unterbrechung: When threat would be placed on a scheme, prevent 1 of that threat. (Nur einmal pro Runde.)

flavor: "Turn around gentlemen, and meet -- the Hellcat!"
name: Hellcat
text: Aktion: Return Hellcat to your hand.

flavor: "You messed with the wrong woman!" -- She-Hulk
name: Gamma Slam
text: Held — Aktion (Angriff): Deal X damage to an enemy (to a maximum of 15). X is the amount of damage you have sustained.

flavor: "These boots were made for stompin'." -- She-Hulk
name: Ground Stomp
text: Held — Aktion: Deal 1 damage to each enemy.

flavor: "That's the first time I've ever seen someone argue their way out of a fight." -- Spider-Man
name: Legal Practice
text: Alter-Ego — Aktion (Widerstand): Choose and discard up to 5 cards from your hand → remove 1 threat from a scheme for each card discarded this way.

flavor: "I just don't care for men with fresh mouths." -- Jennifer Walters
name: One-Two Punch
text: Reaktion: After you make a basic attack (using your ATK), ready She-Hulk.

flavor: "I know a thing or two about rage. And that kind of fury... it's not going to pass without taking someone with it." -- Jennifer Walters
name: Split Personality
text: Aktion: Change your form (flip your identity card). Then, draw up to your printed hand size.

flavor: "I'll be sending you a bill. My time is valuable these days." -- Jennifer Walters
name: Superhuman Law Division
text: Alter-Ego — Aktion (Widerstand): Erschöpfe Superhuman Law Division and spend a [mental]-Ressource → remove 2 threat from a scheme.

name: Focused Rage
text: Held — Aktion: Erschöpfe Focused Rage and take 1 damage → ziehe eine Karte.

name: Superhuman Strength
text: She-Hulk gets +2 ATK. Erzwungene Reaktion: After She-Hulk attacks, discard Superhuman Strength → stun the attacked enemy.

flavor: "I am Iron Man."
name: Iron Man
text: You get +1 hand size for each [[Tech]] upgrade you control (to a maximum hand size of 7).

flavor: "I'm obviously not doing this for the money..."
name: Tony Stark
text: Futurist — Aktion: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand and discard the others. (Nur einmal pro Runde.)

flavor: "Is this a private war -- or can anyone join?"
name: War Machine
text: Aktion: Erschöpfe War Machine and deal 2 damage to him → deal 1 damage to each enemy.

name: Repulsor Blast
text: Held — Aktion (Angriff): Deal 1 damage to an enemy and discard the top 5 cards of your deck. For each printed [energy]-Ressource discarded this way, deal 2 additional damage to that enemy.

flavor: "Nice technique. But if you do it like this... it hurts more." -- Tony Stark
name: Supersonic Punch
text: Held — Aktion (Angriff): Deal 4 damage to an enemy (8 damage instead if you have the [[Fliegend]] trait).

flavor: "Do your thing. I've got this."
name: Pepper Potts
text: Ressource: Erschöpfe Pepper Potts → generate the resources of the top card in your discard pile.

flavor: "I was hoping for something a little bigger. But this will do." -- Tony Stark
name: Stark Tower
text: Alter-Ego — Aktion: Erschöpfe Stark Tower → choose a player. That player returns the topmost [[Tech]] upgrade in their discard pile to their hand.

flavor: "When I put on this armor, I took on more power than any human was ever intended to have... and maybe more responsibility than my heart can truly bear." -- Tony Stark
name: Arc Reactor
text: Held — Aktion: Erschöpfe Arc Reactor → ready Iron Man.

flavor: "Is that all you've got!" -- Tony Stark
name: Mark V Armor
text: You get +6 hit points.

flavor: "Tony, are you sure you want to do that!" -- P.E.P.P.E.R.
name: Mark V Helmet
text: Held — Aktion (Widerstand): Erschöpfe Mark V Helmet → remove 1 threat from a scheme (from each scheme instead if you have the [[Fliegend]] trait).

flavor: "Please, let me give you... a hand." -- Tony Stark
name: Powered Gauntlets
text: Held — Aktion (Angriff): Erschöpfe Powered Gauntlets → deal 1 damage to an enemy (2 damage instead if you have the [[Fliegend]] trait).

name: Rocket Boots
text: You get +1 hit point. Held — Aktion: Erschöpfe Rocket Boots and spend a [mental]-Ressource → gain the [[Fliegend]] trait until the end of the phase.

flavor: "To attack me is to attack Wakanda."
name: Black Panther
text: Retaliate 1. (After this character is attacked, deal 1 damage to the attacking character.)

name: T'Challa
text: Foresight - Setup: Search your deck for a [[Black Panther]] upgrade and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavor: "You would be lost without me, brother!"
name: Shuri
text: Reaktion: After Shuri enters play, search your deck for an upgrade and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavor: "In Wakanda, we draw strength from the knowledge of our ancestors." -- T'Challa
name: Ancestral Knowledge
text: Alter-Ego — Aktion: Choose up to 3 different cards in your discard pile and shuffle them into your deck.

name: Wakanda Forever!
text: Held — Aktion: Resolve the "Special" ability on each [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control in any order. (Resolving each ability is a step in a sequence.)

name: Wakanda Forever!
text: Held — Aktion: Resolve the "Special" ability on each [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control in any order. (Resolving each ability is a step in a sequence.)

name: Wakanda Forever!
text: Held — Aktion: Resolve the "Special" ability on each [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control in any order. (Resolving each ability is a step in a sequence.)

name: Wakanda Forever!
text: Held — Aktion: Resolve the "Special" ability on each [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control in any order. (Resolving each ability is a step in a sequence.)

flavor: "Since the time of Bashenga, we've controlled our destiny as few other nations have."
name: Vibranium

flavor: Wakanda's capital city is an unrivaled architectural and technological marvel.
name: The Golden City
text: Alter-Ego — Aktion: Erschöpfe The Golden City → draw 2 cards.

name: Energy Daggers
text: Special: Choose a player. Deal 1 damage to the villain and to each enemy engaged with that player (2 damage instead if this is the final step of this sequence). (Play the "Wakanda Forever!" event to use this ability.)

name: Panther Claws
text: Special (Angriff): Deal 2 damage to an enemy (4 damage instead if this is the final step of this sequence). (Play the "Wakanda Forever!" event to use this ability.)

name: Tactical Genius
text: Special (Widerstand): Remove 1 threat from a scheme (2 threat instead if this is the final step of this sequence). (Play the "Wakanda Forever!" event to use this ability.)

name: Vibranium Suit
text: Special (Angriff): Move 1 damage from your hero to an enemy (2 damage instead if this is the final step of this sequence). (Play the "Wakanda Forever!" event to use this ability.)

name: Hulk
text: Erzwungene Reaktion: After Hulk attacks, discard the top card of your deck. If that card's printed resource has: [physical] - Deal 2 damage to an enemy. [energy] - Deal 1 damage to each character. [mental] - Discard Hulk. [wild] - All of the above.

flavor: "Sorry -- no autographs."
name: Tigra
text: Reaktion: After Tigra attacks and defeats a minion, heal 1 damage from her.

flavor: "Kamala, we don't have a theme song. Please stop humming one..." -- Captain Marvel
name: Chase Them Down
text: Reaktion (Widerstand): After your hero attacks and defeats an enemy, remove 2 threat from a scheme.

name: Relentless Assault
text: Held — Aktion (Angriff): Deal 5 damage to a minion. If you paid for this card using a [physical]-Ressource, this attack gains overkill. (Excess damage from this attack is dealt to the villain.)

flavor: SMACK!
name: Uppercut
text: Held — Aktion (Angriff): Deal 5 damage to an enemy.

name: The Power of Aggression
text: Max 2 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates while paying for a Aggression (red) card.

name: Tac Team
text: Anwendungen (3 attack counters). (Enters play with 3 counters. Sobald alle Marker entfernt sind, lege diese Karte ab) Aktion: Erschöpfe Tac Team and remove 1 attack counter from it → deal 2 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "Tony! She did it again!" -- Janet Van Dyne
name: Combat Training
text:
Play under any player's control. Max. 1 pro Spieler.
Your hero gets +1 ATK.

flavor: "Sometimes, I think I accomplish more with my fists than with my law firm."
name: Daredevil
text: Reaktion: After Daredevil thwarts, deal 1 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "I am very good at finding people."
name: Jessica Jones
text: Jessica Jones gets +1 THW for each side scheme in play.

flavor: "You lose. And you're going to answer for what you've done." -- Captain America
name: For Justice!
text: Held — Aktion (Widerstand): Remove 3 threat from a scheme (4 threat instead if you paid for this card using a [mental]-Ressource).

name: Great Responsibility
text: Held — Unterbrechung: When any amount of threat would be placed on a scheme, you take it as damage instead.

name: The Power of Justice
text: Max 2 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates while paying for a Justice (yellow) card.

flavor: "Oh, she's sorry! Let me get the keys and call you a car service!" -- Misty Knight
name: Interrogation Room
text: Max. 1 pro Spieler. Reaktion: After you defeat a minion, exhaust Interrogation Room → remove 1 threat from a scheme.

name: Surveillance Team
text: Anwendungen (3 snoop counters). (Enters play with 3 counters. Sobald alle Marker entfernt sind, lege diese Karte ab) Aktion: Erschöpfe Surveillance Team and remove 1 snoop counter from it → remove 1 threat from a scheme.

name: Heroic Intuition
text:
Play under any player's control. Max. 1 pro Spieler.
Your hero gets +1 THW.

name: Hawkeye
text: Hawkeye enters play with 4 arrow counters on him. Reaktion: After a minion enters play, remove 1 arrow counter from Hawkeye → deal 2 damage to that minion.

flavor: "Believe it or not, we all want the same thing."
name: Maria Hill
text: Reaktion: After Maria Hill enters play, each player draws 1 card.

flavor: "I will handle this"
name: Vision
text: Aktion: Spend a [energy]-Ressource → choose THW or ATK. Until the end of the phase, Vision gets +2 to the chosen power. (Nur einmal pro Runde.)

flavor: "We train hard every day so that when the time comes, we'll be ready" -- Steve Rogers
name: Get Ready
text: Aktion: Ready an ally.

flavor: "Let's go everyone!" -- Carol Danvers
name: Lead from the Front
text: Held — Aktion: Choose a player. Each character that player controls gets +1 THW and +1 ATK until the end of the phase.

flavor: "This is a code red! All hands on deck!" -- Maria Hill
name: Make the Call
text: Aktion: Pay the printed cost of an ally in any player's discard pile → put that ally into play under your control.

name: The Power of Leadership
text: Max 2 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates while paying for a Leadership (blue) card.

flavor: "This they made it tall enough?" -- She-Hulk
name: The Triskelion
text: Increase your ally limit by 1. (This allows you to control more than 3 allies.)

flavor: "I'm glad she's on our side." -- Star-Lord
name: Inspired
text:
Attach to an ally. Max 1 per ally.
Attached ally gets +1 THW and +1 ATK.

name: Black Widow
text: Unterbrechung: When a card is revealed from the encounter deck, exhaust Black Widow and spend a [mental]-Ressource → cancel the effects of that card and discard it. Then, reveal another card from the encounter deck.

flavor: "Power Man for hire -- Cage speakin'.
name: Luke Cage
text: Toughness. (This character enters play with a tough status card.)

flavor: "That's what you get!" -- Iron Fist
name: Counter-Punch
text: Reaktion (Angriff): After your hero defends against an enemy attack, deal damage to that enemy equal to your hero's ATK.

flavor: "Ahem! Stand aside, citizens!" -- Ms. Marvel
name: Get Behind Me!
text: Held — Unterbrechung: When a treachery card is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel its "Sobald aufgedeckt" effects. The villain attacks you instead.

name: The Power of Protection
text: Max 2 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates while paying for a Protection (green) card.

name: Med Team
text: Anwendungen (3 medical counters). (Enters play with 3 counters. Sobald alle Marker entfernt sind, lege diese Karte ab.) Aktion: Erschöpfe Med Team and remove 1 medical counter from it → heal 2 damage from a friendly character.

flavor: Life-saving and stylish.
name: Armored Vest
text:
Play under any player's control. Max. 1 pro Spieler.
Your hero gets +1 DEF.

flavor: "We have no choice. So we fight -- and we win. There are no other options." -- Captain America
name: Indomitable
text: Reaktion: After your hero defends, discard indomitable → ready your hero.

name: Mockingbird
text: Reaktion: After Mockingbird enters play, stun an enemy.

name: Nick Fury
text: Erzwungene Reaktion: After Nick Fury enters play, choose one: remove 2 threat from a scheme, draw 3 cards, or deal 4 damage to an enemy. At the end of the round, if Nick Fury is still in play, discard him.

flavor: "CALLING ALL UNITS! CALLING ALL UNITS!"
name: Emergency
text: Unterbrechung (Widerstand): When the villain schemes, reduce the amount of threat placed on the scheme by 1.

flavor: "Does it still qualify as first aid if it's your second day in the hospital?" -- Clint Barton
name: First Aid
text: Aktion: Heal 2 damage from any character.

flavor: WHAM!
name: Haymaker
text: Held — Aktion (Angriff): Deal 3 damage to an enemy.

name: Energy
text: Max 1 per deck.

name: Genius
text: Max 1 per deck..

name: Strength
text: Max 1 per deck..

flavor: "Did you remember to turn off the stove?" -- Janet Van Dyne
name: Avengers Mansion
text: Max. 1 pro Spieler. Aktion: Erschöpfe Avengers Mansion → choose a player. That player draws 1 card.

flavor: "A flying aircraft carrier? You're kidding, right?" -- Jennifer Walters
name: Helicarrier
text: Max. 1 pro Spieler. Aktion: Erschöpfe Helicarrier → choose a player. Reduce the resource cost of the next card that player plays this phase by 1.

name: Tenacity
text: Held — Aktion: Spend a [physical]-Ressource and discard this card → ready your hero.
